body_html:
This is a bit complicated, and I'm not sure I fully understand it, but I believe the explanation of this is here, in the paragraph that starts with "Note that you cannot set the reuse flag to False."
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/how_tos/variable_scope/index.html#basics-of-tf-variable-scope

Let me know if that answers your question; if not just ping this issue.
